channel.title: Need help on windows vista, i cant edit a .class file without error
channel.description: whenever im going to edit any .class files in my server and i save changes i will get an error when i compile it or run it. i would like to know how to edit them and have it work. please i would like to get my own server customized how i like it so i can have more fun. thanks in advance :D
